metadata.metaValue: Create a stage with some geometries and materials

This compound iterate on every geometries to assign a material selected from an array using the modulo operator.

The pattern looks like that: 

* first material assigned to first geo
* second material assigned to second geo
* first material assigned to third geo
* second material assigned to fourth geo
* etc...
# Shows how to create a rule based material assign

Shows how to create a rule based material assign.
In this example, a modulo operation is used.
